page.title: 11Health, Community Care
page.content: Founded in 1976,GREAT BADDOW{COMMUNITY {CARE GROUP}consists of representatives of 20 organisations in the village.It has 230 helpers and is supported by local Clergy, Doctors,Social Workers, Health Visitors and District Nurses. Its aim is to help people of the Parish,young or old, who are in need.A confidential list of volunteers,who are willing to help others in an emergency, covers every road in the Parish.Help includes collecting a prescription or shopping for someone who is alone or housebound; preparing a light meal during illness; sitting in for a while to release a partner and visiting the lonely and housebound There is also transport to drive elderly/housebound to visit their spouses in hospital.A luncheon club is run every Tuesday.Twice a year a buffet lunch is arranged for helpers.
